tabTableEditor.header: Manage your data with the familiarity of a spreadsheet
tabTableEditor.description: You don’t have to be a database expert to start using Supabase — Our table editor makes Postgres easy to use even for non-techies, and you can do everything right in our dashboard.

tabSqlEditor.header: In-built SQL editor for when you need greater control
tabSqlEditor.description: Write, save, and execute SQL queries directly on our dashboard, with templates to help you save time from common queries and even build applications.

tabAuthRules.header: User management as straight-forward as it can be
tabAuthRules.description: Easily manage your users via our authentication, or integrate third party logins. Create policies with complex SQL rules which fit your unique business needs.
